problem.markdown: To whom does AR 350-1 apply? ( ) All civilians, contractors, and civilian support agencies. (x) All Soldiers, functional branches, units, and operating agencies. ( ) Officers, sergeants, and high-ranking government personnel only.

choicegroup.choice: All civilians, contractors, and civilian support agencies.
All Soldiers, functional branches, units, and operating agencies.
Officers, sergeants, and high-ranking government personnel only.
